plugins.treeDescription: The tree symbolizes a curious adventurer. Strong drive and no fear of new things.
plugins.fireDescription: Fire symbolizes energy and passion. It's a quality you need to get things done that go beyond curiosity.
plugins.earthDescription: The earth has the property of keeping its place well without being shaken. As long as you work diligently, you will get good grades.
plugins.goldDescription: Gold stands for substance and skill. The more things you polish, the better you are valued.
plugins.waterDescription: The water symbolizes wisdom and insight. This usually suggests that you have had a good influence on people through a number of great contributions.
plugins.personDescription: The people stat symbolize identity. These stats are a combination of the other stats you have.

common.successEmailSubscription: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter

home.visualizeDevStatsDesc: Enter your github username and visualize your contributions
home.howItWorksDesc: dooboo uses the github API to measure your development combat power
